about_the_game:
Ages of Cataria is a village story generator! Learn your villager's stories as they grow old in your town, customize your village to your aesthetic, and discover a fantastical new land.



Legend has it that the continent of Cataria was home to an ancient civilization. One day, the continent mysteriously vanished and became lost to the world. After hundreds of years, the land of Cataria has been rediscovered and all that remains of the civilization are ruins. Now, thousands have set off to explore Cataria to settle a new home and uncover the mysteries of this land. Craft the origin story of your village, choose your starting location and uncover the legend for yourself.




Choose between two ancestries: Humans or Elves. Elves are plant-like beings, while Humans are... well, we all know what Humans are. Each ancestry has unique building aesthetics, requires different resources, and experiences different lifestyle events.



Boost your villager's productivity by playing minigames around town. From cooking to hunting, each job will have a unique minigame. In addition to boosting your productivity, minigames will also increase your villager's skill level.



Villagers will have different skill proficiencies, personality traits, and wellness levels. You will need to manage your villager's wellness to ensure their comfort and productivity are positive so they can continue having a grand ol' time.



Embark on character-driven quests with your villagers. These interactive novels will define your villager's personality and story. Stories range from small events to life-changing moments.



Customize each of your buildings in town to make your town look unique, or share your style online with others.
detailed_description:

Read about the most recent updates to the game!

name: Ages of Cataria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Care for generations of townsfolk in a land of mystique and wonder. Through interactive short stories, villager relationships, and village maintenance, define the unique story of your village.
